blogPage.title: Blog
blogPage.editOnGitHubInfoLine1: Find an issue with this post? Think you could clarify, update or add something?
blogPage.editOnGitHubInfoLine2: All my posts are available to edit on Github. Any fix, little or small, is appreciated!

projectsPage.detailedProjectList: if you want to have a detailed list of projects I have worked on in my professional career.
projectsPage.workedWith: I am proud to have worked with:
projectsPage.businessProjectsExcerpt: The following abstract of my business project will give you an idea how I helped my clients in previous projects:

segmentationTool.title: Development of a video segmentation tool
segmentationTool.keyContribution1: Planned & executed the extraction of the segmentation tool from a monolithic application
segmentationTool.keyContribution2: Set up, developed and maintained multiple microservices
segmentationTool.keyContribution3: Designed and implemented a Websocket-based dashboard

vhv.title: Development of a car tariff calculator
vhv.keyContribution1: Wrote React wrapper components to integrate the Stencil web components into the Guidewire project
vhv.keyContribution2: Developed & maintained web components in Stencil
vhv.keyContribution3: Migrated separated Stencil & Storybook repositories to a monorepo

tipsPage.title: Tips
tipsPage.intro: This page includes some of the tips that I published on my social media channels.

aboutPage.title: About me
aboutPage.paragraph1: My name is Michael Hoffmann, I'm a freelance software engineer based in Munich/Germany. I hold a Masters in Electrical Engineering from the renown Technical University of Munich (TUM) and have {years}+ years of professional experience.
aboutPage.paragraph2: I work for businesses of all sizes and have experience with both small and medium enterprises and corporates. In my career I have developed, maintained and launched multiple projects from scratch or improved an existing code base. Get in touch, if you like to receive a detailed list of projects I have worked on so far.
aboutPage.paragraph3: Programming is my passion – but especially developing complex business applications both in frontend and in backend. I totally enjoy my work as a freelance developer and developing {privateProjectsLink} under the pseudonym Mokkapps. The reason why I write {blogLink} (also for {inDepthDevLink}) and {publicationLink} is that I like to share my knowledge with others. Therefore, I also try to share most of my projects on {gitHubLink}.
aboutPage.paragraph4: If I do not invest my time in coding I'm usually playing video games or doing sports.
aboutPage.paragraph5: Just contact me if you would like me to work for you.
aboutPage.paragraph6: Visit Uses if you are interested in the software and hardware I use for software development.
aboutPage.whatIDo1: I specialize in building applications written in Angular (not AngularJS) and React. I always develop them with your end-user in mind as this will also help you to meet your business goals
aboutPage.whatIDo2: I am interested in doing development work in backend & frontend applications
aboutPage.whatIDo3: I am reliable and honest to my customers and clients
aboutPage.whatIDo4: I produce high quality, clean, well-documented and easily maintainable code while respecting deadlines and budgets
aboutPage.whatIDo5: I use high code quality standards and static code analyzer
aboutPage.whatIDo6: I create beautifully responsive products which work cross a variety of devices and browsers
aboutPage.whatIDo7: I value accessible, valid and semantic HTML
aboutPage.whatIDo8: I use modernized CSS using Grid, Flexbox, and Animations
aboutPage.whatIDo10: I like strict typing in JavaScript, especially using TypeScript
aboutPage.whatIDo11: I like to write tests (unit, integration and end-to-end)
aboutPage.whoIWorkWithDesc: I enjoy working in a close relationship with international teams on-site or remote. It is great fun for me to learn about new industries, especially if the product has a positive impact.
aboutPage.whatDontDoDesc1: Usually, I do not develop simple websites but am more interested in complex web applications or mobile apps.
aboutPage.whatDontDoDesc2: I can provide simple logos or help you pick typography or colors. In case you need further help with your brand, I am happy to connect you with a trusted graphic and brand designer.

contactPage.title: Contact me
contactPage.contactSuccessDescr: Thanks for your message. I'll answer your request as quick as possible.

newsletterPage.newsletterInfoLine1: I am Senior Freelance Software Engineer and Blogger.
newsletterPage.newsletterInfoLine2: I focus on JavaScript, TypeScript and Java. I'm pretty into Angular, React, Testing and Spring Boot.
newsletterPage.newsletterInfoLine3: Occasionally I also give career & freelancer advice.
newsletterPage.newsletterInfoLine4: My weekly emails reflect this preference.

testimonials.testimonialName1: D.T., Product Owner, ProSiebenSat1 Tech Solutions GmbH
testimonials.testimonialText1: Michael made an important contribution to the progress of the product and, as a team member, enriched the teamwork. He created a large part of the basis that our users can now enjoy working with the app.
testimonials.testimonialName2: T.M., Head of Department Audi mobility, jambit GmbH
testimonials.testimonialText2: Michael worked as a permanent employee in our company and has always done an absolutely excellent job. I can only recommend him!
